data.title: Steve Blake Player Profile, Detroit Pistons
data.meta_description: Get the latest news, stats and more about Steve Blake on RealGM.com
data.text: Jun 26, 2003 - The Washington Wizards selected Steve Blake in Round 2 with Pick 9 in the 2003 NBA Draft. Aug 21, 2003 - Steve Blake signed a multi-year contract with the Washington Wizards. Jun 29, 2005 - The Washington Wizards tendered a Qualifying Offer to make Steve Blake a Restricted FA. Jul 1, 2005 - Steve Blake, previously with the Washington Wizards, became a free agent. Sep 20, 2005 - Steve Blake signed a multi-year offer sheet with the Portland Trail Blazers. Since he is a restricted free agent, the Washington Wizards can match. Sep 29, 2005 - Steve Blake signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers. Jul 31, 2006 - Steve Blake was acquired by the Milwaukee Bucks, along with Ha Seung-Jin, Brian Skinner and a TPE, from the Portland Trail Blazers in exchange for Jamaal Magloire. Jan 11, 2007 - Steve Blake was acquired by the Denver Nuggets, along with a TPE, from the Milwaukee Bucks in exchange for Earl Boykins, Julius Hodge and cash. Jul 1, 2007 - Steve Blake, previously with the Denver Nuggets, became a free agent. Jul 13, 2007 - Steve Blake signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers. Feb 16, 2010 - Steve Blake was acquired by the Los Angeles Clippers, along with Travis Outlaw, cash and a TPE, from the Portland Trail Blazers in exchange for Marcus Camby. Jul 1, 2010 - Steve Blake, previously with the Los Angeles Clippers, became a free agent. Jul 8, 2010 - Steve Blake signed a multi-year contract with the Los Angeles Lakers. Feb 19, 2014 - Steve Blake was acquired by the Golden State Warriors, along with multiple TPEs, from the Los Angeles Lakers in exchange for Kent Bazemore, MarShon Brooks and a TPE. Jul 1, 2014 - Steve Blake, previously with the Golden State Warriors, became a free agent. Jul 10, 2014 - Steve Blake signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers. Jun 18, 2015 - Steve Blake exercised a Player Option to extend his contract. Jun 26, 2015 - Steve Blake was acquired by the Brooklyn Nets, along with the draft rights to Rondae Hollis-Jefferson and a TPE, from the Portland Trail Blazers in exchange for Mason Plumlee, the draft rights to Pat Connaughton and a TPE. Jul 13, 2015 - Steve Blake was acquired by the Detroit Pistons from the Brooklyn Nets in exchange for Quincy Miller. Jul 1, 2016 - Steve Blake, previously with the Detroit Pistons, became a free agent.
